reviewText: I just watch season two of Caroline in the City. It's funnier than ever. I recommend to anyone to order/buy this dvd but buy the first season first to see and understand it. It begs the question how long will season three and four be coming out on dvd? I think that its the dvd sales that have made the show stop selling on dvd. So I think that its up to us the fans of the show to write, send email to the production companies to demained or request to have the rest of the season of Caroline on dvd. How come the UK has the complete set (not having the episodes in order) out on dvd without our region not sellin it?
summary: Amazing Second Season, where is the Thrid & fouth season?
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2

reviewText: I really love this series and was glad to get season 2.  Hopefully season 3 and 4 will be forthcoming.
summary: Can't wait for rest to come out
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2

reviewText: A very good show from the 90s good comedy my wife and I use to watch it all the time it was one of our favorite shows.received very fast from seller . would order from them again.
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2

reviewText: I bought this for my wife because she liked this show when it was on NBC. But even she got bored after watching the episodes a few times. Maybe good for rainy-day viewing, but if you're looking for "must-see TV", it ain't here.
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2

reviewText: This Comedy seems to have faded from our tv memory. But it is clever well cast and has a fair amount of charm. The fact that the ladies had the best legs on the air didn't hurt either.
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2

reviewText: This is a very good comedy that I'd recommend. The writers give these characters some great lines and it is a real treat to watch them interact. If you have not watched it, you should give it a try.
summary: Lea Thompson & Malcolm Gets  excel in this one
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2

reviewText: The characters in Caroline in the City: The Second Season got better as they got used to each other.  The relationships between the characters really blossomed in this season.  The only thing I wish hadn't changed were the credits; the opening credits show other comic strips rather than just the Caroline in the City strip.  There are so many episodes since they are a half-hour long, this television show was a good choice and a good value!
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2

reviewText: Has Paramount given up on this show?  It seems that they decided to stop halfway through the series.  If they're not going to release the final two seasons, then why did they even bother to release the first two?
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2

reviewText: I need the next Season!! I own both Season's one and two and I would love the final season where Caroline finally gets married and Richard bursts into the church. Great stuff!
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2

reviewerName: Thomas A. Reed "Jane! Stop this crazy thing!"
reviewText: This has to be one of my favorite TV shows of all time and I was so happy to find that it and the first season were on DVD. It really has a great cast, and the writing was great. What a great cast.
Title: Caroline in the City: Season 2
